name: Crash 'n' the Boys: Street Challenge
overview: Sure they're from the wrong part of town, but Crash Cooney and his buds from Southside High romped all over the Spring Heel City Track Meet. Now all the rich mama's-boys from up on "The Hill" want a rematch - no rules, no-holds-barred. So they're takin' it to the streets! Control your favorite team - Crash 'N' The Boys of Southside High, or any of the three Hiller schools: Washington High, Lincoln High or Jefferson High. Plus you'll face the computer-controlled Team Thomley - a group of super athletes ready to trounce all the schools. Rage through 5 wild street events - 400 M Hurt-les, Hammer Golf, Water Slaughter, Skyline Scramble and Judo.
